description: Generate an LALR parser (in C) with a formal grammar specification file. See also: bison. More information: https://manned.org/yacc.1p.

useCases.description: Create a file y.tab.c containing the C parser code and compile the grammar file with all necessary constant declarations for values. (Constant declarations file y.tab.h is created only when the -d flag is used):
Compile a grammar file containing the description of the parser and a report of conflicts generated by ambiguities in the grammar:
Compile a grammar file, and prefix output filenames with prefix instead of y:
